shapes.frame_eqs_str: (function(){a['t1']=(a['time']-Math.floor(a['time'])); a['sample']=div(a['instance'],a['num_inst']); a['t_abs']=(a['sample']*3); a['t_rel']=(a['sample']-div(a['time'],5)); a['ampl']=div((2*a['t_abs']),2); a['k1']=Math.sin(div(a['time'],13)); a['k2']=Math.sin(div(a['time'],12)); a['ox']=((a['ampl']*Math.sin((a['t_abs']*(31+(5*a['k1'])))))+((Math.sin(div(a['time'],25))*(1-a['t_abs']))*0.4)); a['oy']=(a['ampl']*Math.cos((a['t_abs']*(31+(5*a['k2']))))); a['oz']=-1; a['r']=sqr(Math.sin((a['t_rel']*3.4))); a['g']=sqr(Math.sin(a['t_rel'])); a['b']=sqr(Math.cos((a['t_rel']*1.75))); a['xang']=div(a['time'],9.5); a['yang']=div((0*a['time']),7); a['zang']=div(-a['time'],22); a['fov']=0.57; a['mx']=((a['ox']*Math.cos(a['zang']))-(a['oy']*Math.sin(a['zang']))); a['my']=((a['ox']*Math.sin(a['zang']))+(a['oy']*Math.cos(a['zang']))); a['ox']=a['mx']; a['oy']=a['my']; a['mx']=((a['ox']*Math.cos(a['yang']))+(a['oz']*Math.sin(a['yang']))); a['mz']=((-a['ox']*Math.sin(a['yang']))+(a['oz']*Math.cos(a['yang']))); a['ox']=a['mx']; a['oz']=a['mz']; a['my']=((a['oy']*Math.cos(a['xang']))-(a['oz']*Math.sin(a['xang']))); a['mz']=((a['oy']*Math.sin(a['xang']))+(a['oz']*Math.cos(a['xang']))); a['oy']=a['my']; a['oz']=a['mz']; a['oz']=(a['oz']-6); a['x']=(div((a['ox']*a['fov']),a['oz'])+0.5); a['y']=(div((a['oy']*a['fov']),a['oz'])+0.5); a['a']=(div(1,a['mz'])*0.49); a['rad']=(div(1,a['mz'])*0.005);}());
